SelectedInfoPanel.TRANSFORMTOOL.PAST_POS: Paste the position, only the X axis.
Paste the position, only the Y axis.
Paste the position, only the Z axis.
SelectedInfoPanel.TRANSFORMTOOL.LOCALAXI: Enable Local Axis modification instead of global axis. That means the axis follows the object Y rotation axis, X axis is always pointing forward of the object.
SelectedInfoPanel.TRANSFORMTOOL.POS_I: The increment of the scroll up/down for the position, scroll up/down or edit the input to change the value.
SelectedInfoPanel.TRANSFORMTOOL.POS_X: The position X global axis, scroll up/down to change the value.
SelectedInfoPanel.TRANSFORMTOOL.POS_Y: The position Y global axis, scroll up/down to change the value.
SelectedInfoPanel.TRANSFORMTOOL.POS_Z: The position Z global axis, scroll up/down to change the value.
SelectedInfoPanel.TRANSFORMTOOL.PAST_ROT: Paste the rotation, only the X axis.
Paste the rotation, only the Y axis.
Paste the rotation, only the Z axis.
SelectedInfoPanel.TRANSFORMTOOL.ROT_I: The increment of the scroll up/down for the rotation, scroll up/down or edit the input to change the value.
SelectedInfoPanel.TRANSFORMTOOL.ROT_X: The rotation X global axis, scroll up/down to change the value.
SelectedInfoPanel.TRANSFORMTOOL.ROT_Y: The rotation Y global axis, scroll up/down to change the value.
SelectedInfoPanel.TRANSFORMTOOL.ROT_Z: The rotation Z global axis, scroll up/down to change the value.
SelectedInfoPanel.TRANSFORMTOOL.PAST_SCA: Paste the scale, only the X axis.
Paste the scale, only the Y axis.
Paste the scale, only the Z axis.
SelectedInfoPanel.TRANSFORMTOOL.SCALE_I: The increment of the scroll up/down for the scale, scroll up/down or edit the input to change the value.
SelectedInfoPanel.TRANSFORMTOOL.SCALE_X: The scale X local axis, scroll up/down or type to change the value.
SelectedInfoPanel.TRANSFORMTOOL.SCALE_Y: The scale Y local axis, scroll up/down or type to change the value.
SelectedInfoPanel.TRANSFORMTOOL.SCALE_Z: The scale Z local axis, scroll up/down or type to change the value.
SelectedInfoPanel.TRANSFORMTOOL.MoveSubB: Enables or disables the movement of building upgrades, which are themselves separate buildings.
SelectedInfoPanel.TRANSFORMTOOL.COPY_POS: Copy the position and the rotation.
SelectedInfoPanel.TRANSFORMTOOL.PAST_POS: Paste the position and the rotation
